name: Project zombies (Trimuredv)
description:
Controls
  • WASD - move around
  •  LeftShift - Sprint
  • LeftMouse - Shoot
  •  RightMouse - Zoom in
  • F - inneract with objects
How to play This game is basically a copy of call of duty zombies. Incase you don't know how that game works here is a helpful documentation. Guns - There are many guns in the game you can also upgrade the guns in the classroom behind door 3 on the right, with the upgrade bench. Power Switch - This switch is located in the last BIG area of the map. This switch powers everything, so to upgrade stuff or get powerups you need to flip it. Wending Machines - Once the power is on you can buy power like more health, 2x damage, Quick reload and speed. How to get more guns? - You can get guns by buying the from the guns on the wall or buy them from the mysterybox. The mysterybox gives you random guns, but when you get the joker card the mysterybox can teleport to a different place on the map. The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible.
